room_title: Escape room "Locked Up" by Exithis in Mansfield
review: The wife and I, with some of her workmates had a great time. Was tougher than I thought it was going to be, but with the clues we escaped! They have 3 rooms I think. We did the prison break one. Was fun!

room_title: Escape room "Locked Up" by Exithis in Mansfield
review: Exithis was so much fun! We did the “Locked Up” room for my friend’s birthday! Couldn’t stop thinking about it for the next couple days. I would highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Locked Up" by Exithis in Mansfield
review: My group had a lot of fun trying to escape from prison. I did an escape room before in Cincinnati, but I didn't enjoy it nearly as much as Exithis. The guys working there were great. Looking forward to going back and trying the Temple Ruins!
